name: Veaceslav
body:
### Hello.
my name is Veaceslav Munteanu and I'm computer science engineer.

### What is this
This is still a mock-up single page from my future blog, yet under construction. I'm on my way to set my own custom blog using github platform.

### Tell me more about you.
I did my bachelor at University Politehnica of Bucharest and now I'm pursuing a master degree in Parallel and Distributed Algorithms at Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam. I love KDE and have some significant contributions to digiKam, an open source alternative to Adobe Lightroom. Also interested in photography, and I own a mirror-less Sony NEX-3N.

### Contact
Github Veaceslav Munteanu(@veaceslav)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
